content.raw:
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2466133158-x2_cam.png)
‌

This is the image output from the camera sensor. Should we tilt it up a bit or is this on purpose?

The bottom part is of the view clipped and hence we see through the ground. If we’re keeping this camera angle then we should reduce the camera near clip distance.
content.html:
‌

This is the image output from the camera sensor. Should we tilt it up a bit or is this on purpose?

The bottom part is of the view clipped and hence we see through the ground. If we’re keeping this camera angle then we should reduce the camera near clip distance.
